About Me

Vue-focused frontend engineer with a passion for exceptional user experiences

I'm a Senior Frontend Engineer with 6+ years of experience building web applications. While I have broad experience across the frontend landscape, I now focus on Vue and its ecosystemâ€”particularly Vue 3, Nuxt, and modern Vue tooling.

Currently working on derivatives trading platforms at Thalex using Vue/Nuxt with real-time data visualization, I've also contributed to products at ANWB, Van Lanschot Kempen, and DPG Media. My work has been recognized with an ANWB award for innovation.

I focus on performance, accessibility, and maintainable code. Whether building component libraries, migrating legacy applications, or creating new products from scratch, I bring strong technical expertise and a user-centered approach to every project.

Available for freelance contracts and project work. Based in the Netherlands with EU/UK work rights.
